attributes.additional_details:
To save Second Chance Rescue, Chellaston, Derby from closure.

The landlord has got permission to build 190 homes on the site with Clowes Development and Bellway homes.

Giving the family and animals 6mths to relocate, they have been told that if there is enough money left in the pot so to speak they will help the rescue relocate. This hasn't happened yet.

Please sign and share this petition to show your support for the rescue who have saved the lives of hundreds of dog's and other animals over the years.
